mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REQUEST ORDER BY REQ_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REQUEST (REQ_NO, MASTER_NO, CLIENT_NO, CONTENT, REQUEST_DATE, REQUEST_TIME, ADDRESS, ADDRESS_DETAIL, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, PHONE_NUM) VALUES (REQUEST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{masterNo}, #{clientNo}, #{content}, #{requestDate}, #{requestTime}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{phoneNum})
